item.title: Git worktrees
item.description: I have been using git worktree successfully for a while now and this post is about one little detail that could be annoying when working with git worktrees. It is quite common to clone a bare repository and work on that using the following git clone --bare git@github.com:udayblog/public_cloud.git public_cloud You can start adding worktrees and work on the fixes with the following cd public_cloud git worktree add -b hotfix hotfix main cd hotfix touch file_to_fix.
